Rocky Helmet.desc: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.
Rocky Helmet.name: Rocky Helmet

Ice Gem.desc: Holder's first successful Ice-type attack will have 1.3x power. Single use.
Ice Gem.name: Ice Gem

Waterium Z.desc: If holder has a Water move, this item allows it to use a Water Z-Move.
Waterium Z.name: Waterium Z

TR54.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Toxic Spikes. One use.
TR54.name: TR54

Pinsirite.desc: If held by a Pinsir, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.
Pinsirite.name: Pinsirite

Salac Berry.desc: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Salac Berry.name: Salac Berry

Grass Gem.desc: Holder's first successful Grass-type attack will have 1.3x power. Single use.
Grass Gem.name: Grass Gem

Hondew Berry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.
Hondew Berry.name: Hondew Berry

Aloraichium Z.desc: If held by an Alolan Raichu with Thunderbolt, it can use Stoked Sparksurfer.
Aloraichium Z.name: Aloraichium Z

Icy Rock.desc: Holder's use of Hail lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Icy Rock.name: Icy Rock

Pixie Plate.desc: Holder's Fairy-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Fairy type.
Pixie Plate.name: Pixie Plate

Mind Plate.desc: Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Psychic type.
Mind Plate.name: Mind Plate

Power Herb.desc: Holder's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop). Single use.
Power Herb.name: Power Herb

TR71.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Leaf Storm. One use.
TR71.name: TR71

Macho Brace.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Macho Brace.name: Macho Brace

Star Sweet.desc: Evolves Milcery into Alcremie when held and spun around.
Star Sweet.name: Star Sweet

TR25.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Psyshock. One use.
TR25.name: TR25

Choice Specs.desc: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Choice Specs.name: Choice Specs

Power Lens.desc: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Power Lens.name: Power Lens

Insect Plate.desc: Holder's Bug-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Bug type.
Insect Plate.name: Insect Plate

Aguav Berry.desc: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpD Nature. Single use.
Aguav Berry.name: Aguav Berry

Leppa Berry.desc: Restores 10 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.
Leppa Berry.name: Leppa Berry

Ability Shield.desc: Holder's Ability cannot be changed by any effect.
Ability Shield.name: Ability Shield

TR38.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Trick. One use.
TR38.name: TR38

Lure Ball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing.
Lure Ball.name: Lure Ball

Malicious Armor.desc: Evolves Charcadet into Ceruledge when used.
Malicious Armor.name: Malicious Armor

TR81.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Foul Play. One use.
TR81.name: TR81

Wellspring Mask.desc: Ogerpon-Wellspring: 1.2x power attacks; Terastallize to gain Embody Aspect.
Wellspring Mask.name: Wellspring Mask

Icium Z.desc: If holder has an Ice move, this item allows it to use an Ice Z-Move.
Icium Z.name: Icium Z

Lunalium Z.desc: Lunala or Dawn Wings Necrozma with Moongeist Beam can use a special Z-Move.
Lunalium Z.name: Lunalium Z

TR14.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Metronome. One use.
TR14.name: TR14

PRZ Cure Berry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.
PRZ Cure Berry.name: PRZ Cure Berry

Loaded Dice.desc: Holder's moves that hit 2-5 times hit 4-5 times; Population Bomb hits 4-10 times.
Loaded Dice.name: Loaded Dice

Payapa Berry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Psychic-type attack. Single use.
Payapa Berry.name: Payapa Berry

Sky Plate.desc: Holder's Flying-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Flying type.
Sky Plate.name: Sky Plate

Metronome.desc: Damage of moves used on consecutive turns is increased. Max 2x after 5 turns.
Metronome.name: Metronome

Yache Berry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.
Yache Berry.name: Yache Berry

Choice Band.desc: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Choice Band.name: Choice Band

Fossilized Dino.desc: Can revive into Arctovish with Fossilized Fish or Arctozolt with Fossilized Bird.
Fossilized Dino.name: Fossilized Dino

Mewnium Z.desc: If held by a Mew with Psychic, it can use Genesis Supernova.
Mewnium Z.name: Mewnium Z

TR16.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Waterfall. One use.
TR16.name: TR16

TR73.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Gunk Shot. One use.
TR73.name: TR73

Griseous Orb.desc: If held by a Giratina, its Ghost- and Dragon-type attacks have 1.2x power.
Griseous Orb.name: Griseous Orb

TR35.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Uproar. One use.
TR35.name: TR35

Dread Plate.desc: Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Dark type.
Dread Plate.name: Dread Plate

TR56.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Aura Sphere. One use.
TR56.name: TR56

TR75.desc: Teaches certain Pokemon the move Stone Edge. One use.
TR75.name: TR75

Rindo Berry.desc: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Single use.
Rindo Berry.name: Rindo Berry

Metal Coat.desc: Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.2x power. Evolves Onix into Steelix and Scyther into Scizor when traded.
Metal Coat.name: Metal Coat
